Name: PageTitle
Content: CMZero - Small chunk content management system

Name: ConceptBody
Content: Label based CMS makes things easier to change and integrate

Name: GettingStartedBody
Content: To get started you need an api key. Sign up here...

Name: HowToUseBody
Content: All you need to do is enter your labels into out CMS and then call the API in your view model

Name: WhyLabelBasedBody
Content: Label based CMS allows to you just have individual labels editable in your system. No onerous frameworks that wont suite your needs. Mobile apps need a release to change a label? Not any more.

Name: AboutBody
Content: CMZero is fully opensource and developed by Artificial Gold. We charge for the hosted version but you can download for yourself at...
